nodes.text: Kardue'sai'Malloc, also known as Labria, was a Devaronian male who was a patron of Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina on Tatooine shortly before the Battle of Yavin. Kardue'sai'Malloc was a cruel army captain on his homeworld Devaron who committed deadly crimes. He fled his wicked past and one of the the galaxy's highest bounties and lived under the alias Labria in Mos Eisley on Tatooine, where he tried to pass as a major informant. He was, in truth however, a terrible spy.
